name: Grand Theft Auto 2
overview: Grand Theft Auto comes to Game Boy Color! Seven ruthless gangs are involved in a brutal power struggle. Make a name for yourself, but watch your back. Respect is earned, not given. Intelligent gang system - earn and maintain the respect of gangs to get the best jobs and special favors or play the gangs off against each other in turf wars. Completely open and non-linear gameplay frees you to carve your own way to the top. Fully reactive urban environment which responds to your every move.
